titleStmt.title: A panegyrick, on His Grace the Duke of Albemarle, installed chancellor of the University of Cambridge, May the 11th. 1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N. Thompson, next the Cross-Keys in Fetter-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Amidst the noisy crouds of jealous fears ..."
Imperfect: stained, affecting imprint and text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
